name: Responsive Scrollable Table
author: pandasilk

sections.description:
WordPress Responsive Scrollable Table plugin makes tables within WordPress content area responsive. The responsive table will display a horizontal scroll bar if the screen is too small to display the full content. Enhance the mobile experience of website.

For more, refer to Responsive Scrollable Table Document
sections.installation:
1. Navigate to the “Add New” in the plugins dashboard
  2. Search for “Responsive Scrollable Table”
  3. Click “Install Now”
  4. Activate the plugin on the Plugin dashboard
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Navigate to the “Add New” in the plugins dashboard
  2. Search for “Responsive Scrollable Table”
  3. Click “Install Now”
  4. Activate the plugin on the Plugin dashboard

To make tables responsive, you need to use the shortcode [ScrollableTable] the-table-inside [/ScrollableTable], this can be done easily with the help of quick tag in WordPress Text Editor.
